net.javacoding.jspider.core.task
Interface WorkerTask

All Superinterfaces:
Task
All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseWorkerTaskImpl
public interface WorkerTask
extends Task

Interface that will be implemented upon each class that represents a JSpider workertask that needs to be executed by a Worker Thread. JSpider has two types of tasks: spider tasks (that fetch data from a web server), and thinker tasks (that interpret data, take decision, etc...) $Id: WorkerTask.java,v 1.5 2003/04/25 21:29:02 vanrogu Exp $

Author:
Günther Van Roey

Field Summary
static int WORKERTASK_SPIDERTASK
          Task type that is used for every task that will require the fetching of data from a site.
static int WORKERTASK_THINKERTASK
          Task type used for all tasks that don't require any fetching of data
 
Method Summary
 int getType()
          Returns the type of the task - spider or thinker.
 void prepare()
          Allows some work to be done before the actual Task is carried out.
 void tearDown()
          Allows us to put common code in the abstract base class.
 
Methods inherited from interface net.javacoding.jspider.core.task.Task
execute

Method Detail

getType

public int getType()
Returns the type of the task - spider or thinker.
Returns:
the type of the task

prepare

public void prepare()
Allows some work to be done before the actual Task is carried out. During the invocation of prepare, the WorkerThread's state will be WORKERTHREAD_BLOCKED.

tearDown

public void tearDown()
Allows us to put common code in the abstract base class.
